clues.response: the iris (or lens, cone, rods, or uvea)

clues.text: With a cleft in it to allow room for the heart, your left one only has 2 lobes instead of 3 like the right

A sock in the eye hurts; a sockeye is this fish

This word is the same in singular or plural, so Dr. Seuss was correct when he wrote "One" This "Two" This
